content: तूणः [तूण्-कर्मणि घज्] A quiver; मिलितशिलीमुखपाटलिपटलकृतस्मरतूणविलासे <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 7. 57.</ls> --णी {@--1@} An internal disease by which the anus and the bladder become painfully affected. {@--2@} The indigo plant. {@--3@} A quiver; <ls>R. 9. 56</ls>; <ls>U. 4. 20</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1. 18.</ls>
